metadata.description: Zorro is murdered! Who stands ready to emancipate all the girls of an entire village from the evil slavers who would prey upon them? Lady Zorro and Lady Rawhide -- would sooner ride alone another than ride together, but that's just what they'll have to do to free all the missing girls from a fate worse than death! Featuring cover artwork by Lady Rawhide co-creator, Mike Mayhew!
metadata.name: Lady Rawhide/Lady Zorro
